levels.title: Beginner's Challenge
levels.description: Start with a simple 3x3 grid and three colors. This level is for new players to learn the mechanics.

levels.title: A Bit More Challenging
levels.description: The grid size increases to 4x4, and you'll need to match more tiles to clear the level.

levels.title: Tighter Time
levels.description: The grid expands to a 5x5 square, and the time limit is reduced. You'll need to think and act faster.

levels.title: Nightmare I - First Test
levels.description: The difficulty ramps up with a tighter time limit, but the color palette stays the same.

levels.title: Relief - Back to Basics
levels.description: The grid and goals are scaled back to give you a break after the last challenge.

levels.title: Wider Grid, More Tiles
levels.description: The grid widens to a 6x5. You'll find more matches, but still with three colors.

levels.title: Nightmare II - Speed Demon
levels.description: The goals have increased significantly to challenge your speed and matching skills.

levels.title: Relief - Catch Your Breath
levels.description: The grid and goals are slightly easier to give you more room to think after the last challenge.

levels.title: The Gauntlet
levels.description: The grid expands to a 7x7 with just three colors.

levels.title: Nightmare III - Color Shock
levels.description: A new color, **Magenta**, is finally added. You'll need to be fast and strategic with this expanded color palette.

levels.title: Relief - The Grid Returns
levels.description: The grid shrinks to give you a little more breathing room, but the goals are still high.

levels.title: Big Square Grid
levels.description: A new color, **Yellow**, is introduced on a big 8x8 grid with a tight time limit and high goals.

levels.title: Nightmare IV - Blue Funk
levels.description: A new color, **Blue**, is added. The goals are high, and the grid is at its maximum size.

levels.title: Relief - The Challenge Fades
levels.description: A slightly easier level to give you a chance to recover. The grid is smaller, and the time limit is more forgiving.

levels.title: The Big Seven
levels.description: All seven colors are on the board with a large 8x8 grid. Goals and time are demanding, requiring quick thinking.

levels.title: Clash of Colors
levels.description: A chaotic level on a new 7x8 grid where you'll need to focus and eliminate colors efficiently. The time limit is even tighter.

levels.title: Nightmare V - The Final Ascent
levels.description: This is a grueling challenge on a tall, narrow 8x6 grid with maximum goals and a very short time limit.

levels.title: Relief - Peaceful Pause
levels.description: A final chance to decompress on a wide 6x7 grid. The grid is smaller and the time limit is extended.

levels.title: The Last Push
levels.description: You're on the brink of victory. This level is a final tune-up for the grand finale. The goals are high, but the time is manageable.

levels.title: The Grand Finale
levels.description: This is the final test of your skills. With a huge grid and all seven colors, you'll need to master every aspect of the game to beat the clock and complete your quest.
